en.bodyPlayAgainWarning: You can play levels again if you want to earn 3 stars!
en.titleRateTheGame: Hey, don’t forget to rate the game!
en.star_dontRepeatLevel: Try completing the level without resetting to checkpoints...
en.gameOverMessage: Game over, but don't worry you can try again!
en.134696d4: Om Nom got his candy, and the math was right thanks to you!
en.3c244b0c:
In this level, even if you switch the order you collect the stars, the answer stays the same!

When we are adding, the order does not affect the sum.
en.2ff68a01:
Did you notice?
The numbers on the stars show how many ones you collected!
en.1c1b1483: Hi! This is our friend Om Nom, and he needs your help with two very important things!
en.71b8134c: But here's the catch: no candy unless the math is right.
en.a033979a: So collect the correct number of units, then deliver the candy to Om Nom!
en.f557d8db:
Did you notice? Now you’re collecting hundreds too!

Just like 10 ones make 1 ten, and 10 tens make 1 hundred!
en.56089afe:
Some stars have negative numbers

That means you’re taking away instead of adding.
It’s called subtraction!
en.1c746936:
Did you notice?
When you collected 10 ones, they turned into 1 ten
en.2d5be481: Collect stars unti the current value is the same as the goal!
en.da95e743: Slide your finger to cut the rope
en.dafc70c1: Collect the Stars to form the goal number
en.db3495ec: Collect stars to make the goal number.
en.13cd9517: Negative stars subtract from your total.
en.62538a50: Negative stars subtract from your total
en.2c26943f: The bubble will lift the candy up
en.c5865647: Don't let the candy leave the box
en.3ecd9dc5: You can cut more than one rope at once.
en.e4825f09: Some rope hoocks can be moved with your finger
en.93b7f4ce: Keep the candy away from spikes
